rows.label: qst202407_msg0001
rows.name: Why did you attack Avaritia?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0002
rows.name:
Our Kountess went missing!
So we are looking for her!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0003
rows.name:
We heard a rumor that the
dirty furballs kidnapped
our Kountess to Avaritia!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0004
rows.name:
To save her, we hid among
the cargo and came here!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0005
rows.name:
I see. So you came all this
way to find your Kountess.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0006
rows.name:
In that case, we'll help you
out. Can you tell us her name
and what she looks like?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0007
rows.name: The Kountess? Her name?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0008
rows.name: Do any of you remember?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0009
rows.name: No, I don't remember.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0010
rows.name: What was it again?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0011
rows.name:
What, you don't remember
your own Kountess?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202407_msg0012
rows.name: See? I'm smarter than them, after all.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0013
rows.name: Oh! You look just like the Kountess!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0014
rows.name:
Would you become our
Kountess and live with us?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0015
rows.name: What?! No way!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0016
rows.name:
If you become Kountess, you'll
get three meals a day and naps,
and you won't have to work.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0017
rows.name: How about it? It's a good deal, right?

rows.label: qst202407_msg0018
rows.name: Hmmm...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202407_msg0019
rows.name: That does sound nice!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0020
rows.name: But no, I'd rather not!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0021
rows.name: No, no! That's not a good idea!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0022
rows.name:
We'll find your real Kountess,
so give up on Ibuki!

rows.label: qst202407_msg0023
rows.name:
Three meals and naps sounds
tempting, but I really don't
want to be a Kountess.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0024
rows.name:
Is that so...[ML:Dash ] That's a shame,
but it can't be helped.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0025
rows.name: We don't have any clues at all.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0026
rows.name:
Let's ask the Merc Group to
gather some information for us.

rows.label: qst202407_msg0027
rows.name:
First, we need to find out
where the Tirkin Kountess is.
